data.trans: (+sth): Đóng góp một phần quan trọng để đạt được cái gì
data.trans_hint: Công việc mà học sinh đang làm sẽ được tính vào điểm tổng kết của các em.
data.en_hint: The work that the students are doing will count towards their final grade.
data.content_game_1: The work that the students are doing will count towards their final grade.
data.answer_en_hint: The work that the students are doing will count towards their final grade.

data.trans: Vượt qua bài kiểm tra, kì thi một cách dễ dàng
data.trans_hint: Tôi đã vượt qua bài kiểm tra tiếng Anh mà không có một lỗi nào.
data.en_hint: I sailed through the English exam without a mistake.
data.content_game_1: I sailed through the English exam without a mistake.
data.answer_en_hint: I sailed through the English exam without a mistake.

data.trans_hint: Anh ấy đậu ngành luật tại đại học Durham.
data.en_hint: He's got in Durham to study law.
data.content_game_1: He's Got in Durham to study law.
data.answer_en_hint: He's Got in Durham to study law.

data.trans: Vượt qua cái gì, làm được cái gì
data.trans_hint: Chúng ta phải bắt đầu bây giờ thôi, có nhiều việc cần làm lắm.
data.en_hint: We have to start now, there's a lot to get through.
data.content_game_1: We have to start now, there's a lot to get through.
data.answer_en_hint: We have to start now, there's a lot to get through.

data.trans: (Ở trạng thái) Lo lắng, buồn bã
data.trans_hint: Tôi đã rất lo lắng khi tôi làm bài thi nói, vì vậy nếu tôi không đỗ bài thi này, tôi cũng sẽ không ngạc nhiên lắm.
data.en_hint: I was in a terrible state when I did the speaking test, so I would not be surprised if I didn't pass the test.
data.content_game_1: I was in a terrible state when I did the speaking test, so I would not be surprised if I didn't pass the test.
data.answer_en_hint: I was in a terrible state when I did the speaking test, so I would not be surprised if I didn't pass the test.

data.trans_hint: Mặc dù tôi nhận ra rằng kinh tế không phải dành cho tôi, nhưng tôi vẫn không bỏ cuộc.
data.en_hint: Even though I realized that economics was not for me, I didn't give it up.
data.content_game_1: Even though I realized that economics was not for me, I didn't give it up.
data.answer_en_hint: Even though I realized that economics was not for me, I didn't give it up.

data.trans: Trống rỗng, không nhớ ra điều gì
data.trans_hint: Khi giáo viên hỏi tôi về bài tập về nhà, đầu óc tôi như trống rỗng vậy.
data.en_hint: When the teacher asked me about the homework, my mind just went blank.
data.content_game_1: When the teacher asked me about the homework, my mind just went blank.
data.answer_en_hint: When the teacher asked me about the homework, my mind just went blank.

data.trans_hint: Bởi vì tôi đã không học cái phần xuất hiện trong bài kiểm tra lịch sử nên tôi đã làm không tốt.
data.en_hint: Because I didn't study the part that came up in the history test, I messed it up.
data.content_game_1: Because I didn't study the part that came up in the history test, I messed it up.
data.answer_en_hint: Because I didn't study the part that came up in the history test, I messed it up.

data.trans_hint: Tôi không có đủ thời gian để hoàn thành bài kiểm tra, bởi vậy tôi đã bỏ qua một số câu hỏi.
data.en_hint: I didn't have enough time to finish the test, so I had to miss out some questions.
data.content_game_1: I didn't have enough time to finish the test, so I had to miss out some questions.
data.answer_en_hint: I didn't have enough time to finish the test, so I had to miss out some questions.

data.trans_hint: Ban đầu, tôi nghĩ chuyên ngành Tiếng Anh không phải sở thích của tôi, nhưng sau vài năm học tập, tôi muốn phát triển nghề nghiệp ở lĩnh vực này.
data.en_hint: At first, I thought the English major was not for me, but after a few years studying the language, I want to develop a career in the field.
data.content_game_1: At first, I thought the English major was not for me, but after a few years studying the language, I want to develop a career in the field.
data.answer_en_hint: At first, I thought the English major was not for me, but after a few years studying the language, I want to develop a career in the field.

data.trans: Có khả năng thành công, đạt được điều gì đó
data.trans_hint: Nếu bạn học hành đủ chăm chỉ, bạn sẽ có khả năng học trường đại học mà bạn muốn.
data.en_hint: If you work hard enough, you will stand a chance of going to the university that you want.
data.content_game_1: If you work hard enough, you will stand a chance of going to the university that you want.
data.answer_en_hint: If you work hard enough, you will stand a chance of going to the university that you want.

data.trans: Cực kỳ thành công, đạt kết quả xuất sắc
data.trans_hint: Nếu không có sự giúp đỡ của bạn thì tôi sẽ không thể vượt qua kỳ thi một cách dễ dàng và cực kỳ thành công được.
data.en_hint: Had it not been for you help, I would not have been able to pass the exam with flying colours.
data.content_game_1: Had it not been for you help, I would not have been able to pass the exam with flying colours.
data.answer_en_hint: Had it not been for you help, I would not have been able to pass the exam with flying colours.
